metadata.title: Database for Plotnikovis Method of Ice Forecasting

creators.name: Far Eastern Hydrometeorlogical Institute, Pacific Fisheries Research Center (TINRO-Center)

metadata.description: 10-day mean drifting ice boundary in the western part of the Bering Sea. One of predictors for Plotnikovis statistic method of ice forecasting. Information derived from charts of Russian air observations.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Ice forecasting for the next month.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: Irregular

Access constraints: Permission of TINRO director is necessary.

Use constraints: Permission of TINRO director is necessary
